DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of ZD6126 in Combination with Oxaliplatin, 5-Fluorouracil and Leucovorin in Subjects with Metastatic Colorectal Cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of ZD6126 in Combination With Oxaliplatin, 5-Fluorouracil and Leucovorin in Subjects With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer.
DOC.criteria: Metastatic colorectal carcinoma Suitable for firstline treatment of metastatic disease Peripheral neuropathy greater than Grade 1 Adjuvant therapy within 6 months prior to study treatment Prior oxaliplatin Prior pelvic or whole abdomen radiation Any history of coronary angioplasty or history of myocardial infarction
